title: Find the LCD of the Fractions
speech: LCD of  fraction, x plus 13, over, x squared minus 7 x plus 10,  , , fraction, 6 over, x minus 5,  , and , fraction, 4 over, x minus 2,   is  parentheses x minus 5,  times, parentheses x minus 2,  .
pacedSpeech: LCD of   fraction, x plus 13, over, x squared minus 7 x plus 10,
is    x minus 5,  times,  x minus 2,

title: Clear All Fractions
text: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get $$x+13=6(x-2)-4(x-5)$$.
speech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get  x plus 13, is equal to 6 times, parentheses x minus 2,  minus, 4 times, parentheses x minus 5,  .
pacedSpeech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get   x plus 13, is equal to 6 times,  x minus 2,  minus, 4 times,  x minus 5,

title: Simplify the Equation
text: Let's simplify this equation: $$x+13=6x-12-4x+20$$. This simplifies to $$x=5$$.
speech: Let's simplify this equation:  x plus 13, is equal to 6 x minus 12 minus 4 x plus 20 . This simplifies to  x is equal to 5 .
pacedSpeech: Let's simplify this equation:   x plus 13, is equal to 6 x minus 12 minus 4 x plus 20
. This simplifies to   x is equal to 5

title: Solve the Equation
text: $$x=5$$ is our solution, but it is extraneous since it is in the denominator of the original equation. DNE.
